summary: A young man from the countryside uses his skills in silat martial arts to survive the slave trade.
cast: Iko Uwais|Sisca Jessica|Christine Hakim|Mads Koudal|Yusuf Aulia|Alex Abbad|Yayan Ruhian|Laurent Buson|Donny Alamsyah|Ratna Galih|Libby Brien|Raiya Galih|Rahyma Yanii|Philip Hersh
title: Merantau
